data.description:
Focus displays images from your photo library or from online sources.

Open the Pebble Settings to choose your images. iOS users can choose to take an image from the camera or photo library. Both iOS and Android users can enter the URL of an image.

Once an image is selected, you can adjust the image by dragging it or using the sliders to change the scale, brightness, and contrast.

Custom settings include location of time, colors, date format, battery, connection, and vibration alerts.

data.author: Erik

changelog.release_notes: - Fixed a bug in which old settings were not being overwritten by new ones, causing the watchface to revert any config change immediately.

- Added a preference toggle for the feature that turns the face to grayscale if Bluetooth is disconnected
- Tentative Diorite support (i.e. it compiles and runs on the emulator). Bug reports welcomed.
Fixed layout when in Quick View (the date is now positioned correctly, and the hands are shortened)
Fixed a bug where the background would flash as the watchface was loading (and remain black in certain cases).

- The settings screen now used the new Clay interface instead of a page hosted on my website. This will make the settings independent of my personal internet connection (or lack thereof).
- Several improvements under the hood
- Should be ready for the new "Quick View" overlay on the Pebble Time, though I have no way to test this ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
Fixed a bug where old appointments would remain if there were no new ones
Now keeps the calendar cached. It still loads an update, but the watchface doesn't look "empty" initially.
Added a pie chart feature, enabled by setting appointment circle and appointments to the same color
The date now moves around to avoid being covered by the clock hands.
- Fixed an error where the date would have the wrong color, and the color setting for date didn't have any effect
Now available for Aplite!
Fixed a problem where the watchface would ignore the background color setting.
Initial release

data.description:
View your calendar at a glance! Link any number of Google Calendars to have your appointments appear as markers along your watch's edge. Full color customization is supported.

Currently, the free/busy information from your Google Calendar must be public for this watchface to work. You can make that happen in the calendar's settings.

latest_release.release_notes: - Fixed a bug in which old settings were not being overwritten by new ones, causing the watchface to revert any config change immediately.

data.description:
*If you get a black screen, please toggle/select something for all settings on the configuration page and try resubmitting*

VerticalText. Read from top-to-bottom, right-to-left. English because we're still waiting for real support for languages that actually get written in this way.
Each line represents a digit, in HH:MM format.
Configurable! Please visit the config page initially to turn on/off some functions and pick your own design.

Note: Pebble Time Round compatible, but the design does not yield to the round display. It's up to you to decide if you like it or not.

Font Credits (Acknowledgment, not endorsed by):
LECO 2014 by Josen Fonts, placed in the Public Domain.
Lato by Łukasz Dziedzic, used under the terms of the SIL Open Font License 1.1.
Square by Wouter van Oortmerssen, used under the terms of the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License.
Links to copies of the licenses can be found in the config page.

data.author: Andrey Fomchenko
data.description:
Bright and elegant arcs to tell you the time. 
Assign any arc to any time unit (hour, minute, second) or skip any you don't need (exclude second unit to preserve battery life). 
Use optional precision markers (dots) if you need to know the time with absolute precision. 
Add inner and/or outer frame for faster time reading.
6 color schemes available: blue, green, grey, orange, red, violet.

Please heart if you like, donate if you love, email for any feedback. Thank you! :)
data.title: Arcs of Time

data.description:
Simple, elegant and highly configurable analog watch face. Show some love and give it a heart...help me reach 1.9K likes!

- Multi language (English, Deutsch, Espanol, Francais, Italiano, Portugues)
- "A" battery rating
- Full color control of 8 properties (18+ trillion variations)
- Optional weather display (when enabled automatically pulls current weather every half hour)
- 14 day/night weather icons
- Weather data from either OpenWeatherMap or WUnderground
- Optional vibration on BlueTooth disconnect
- Fully configurable hourly vibration
- Do not disturb option
- Shows bluetooth and battery status

OpenWeatherMap doesn't require signing up for any outside service.  

Thanks to Nicko Guyer for the color pallet layout inspiration!

Hope you enjoy it!

latest_release.release_notes: Updates configuration page to allow for clay

data.description:
A recreation of a vintage watch from a popular burger joint. Jack's Moonlight will give you nightmares before your Christmas holiday. With the purchase of the license key, you can unlock additional features. Go into the watch face settings on your phone to purchase a license for $0.99 cents.

Features:

Bluetooth connection: When disconnected, the background color will go white.

Battery meter: When the battery is drained, the moon is be more of a crescent. There are five stages.

License Key Features:

Date and Temperature with a flick or tap of your wrist.

Get a backdrop of the current weather that includes clouds, rain, snow, lightning, and wind.

Ability to get weather data form OpenWeatherMap from either GPS settings or Country and Postal Code input. Some devices may not work with GPS and the use of Postal Code will yield general results.
 
If you do purchase a license key and do not receive the email, check your junk folder. If you still haven't received on, email me and I will have one sent to you. 

Thank you and enjoy!

latest_release.release_notes:
v1.5:

For phone where GPS is not working or disabled. You can now selection a Country and Postal Code for general weather information. This may break GPS settings until it is set to the on position when updated.

data.title: Jack's Moonlight

data.description: This watchface displays the time in binary using a 12-5-9 format. The first row displays the hour, the second displays the first digit of the minute, and the third displays the right digit of the minute (all in binary). The bottom left and right corners display symbols representing AM or PM (* for AM and - for PM). As binary watchfaces go, this format is fairly quick to read, so you can look nerdy and tell the time simultaneously. This version also shows the month, weekday, and day of the month (4 bits, 4 bits, and 5 bits). Month is displayed on the left, weekday on the right, and day of the month on the bottom.

latest_release.release_notes: Updated to SDK 3

data.title: 12-5-9 Enhanced Binary Watchface

data.author: Olivier Pasco

changelog.release_notes: 2.10 - added a dark background option plus some other UI tweaks
2.9 - bug fix
2.8 (yes, not 2.08 because CloudPebble won't let me use it) - Health goals can now be set manually
2.07 - just some optimization to reduce the battery usage by redrawing only what needs to be refreshed
2.06 - fixed a stupid bug that was causing some more annoying vibration when reaching a round number of hours of activity and honestly I'm not sure why it did not cause other issues...
2.05 - Fixed a few bugs including more annoying vibrations for people practicing too much sport...
2.04 - apparently vibrations are still annoying (and buggy) so they are now optionnal...
2.03 - quick fix for people using 12h time format and some annoying vibration issue (hopefully less annoying now)
2.02 - Added support for Dual Time, a few vibration warnings and fixed a few bugs

2.01 - Some changes in the UI
- I removed the sliders because, well, I didn't really like them...
- Health info is now showing on the outer ring of the watch. Arrow pointing up is for steps and arrow pointing down is for activity. The arrows move clockwise to indicate progress. Current goals are displayed at the top of the watch
- Rain indication is now a text warning (displayed only if rain is coming). It indicates rain forecast for the next 3 hours.
- The date moved to the middle right of the watch
- New options: you can now enable/disable the date, health indicators, the compass and run-time debug messages
2.0 - now with a compass (experimental) and a settings page! Current options: turn On/Off compass and turn On/Off some run time debug messages. More options should come soon...
1.14 - something unfortunate happened to the hours and minutes hands color. I hope this will make things right again...
1.13 - small tweaks based on early users feadback
1.12 - Some UI tweaks and a better rainfall indicator
1.11 - fixed a few UI bugs, mostly on Pebble Time
1.10 - seems that I'm not using the persistent storage API correctly, which is wired because it looks straight forward enough. Hopefully it is resolved now...
1.9 - changed the activity scales. Now it starts at 2000 steps and 30 minutes of activity and (hopefully) sets itself up to whatever new daily record you set.

1.8 - changed the style of the 3H Rain indicator and made it always visible and added (experimental) support for daily steps goal (currently fixed at 10000/day) and activity (on a fixed base of 8h sleep/day).
1.07 - Added Aplite version (requires firmware 3.8)
1.06 - improved the visibility of the weather icon

data.description:
Analog Pebble Round watch with a simple design but loaded with:
- time (obviously)
- Dual Time (can be used also as a secondary digital time display)
- Battery indicator (the "seconds" hand, rotating counter clockwise as the battery drains)
- weather information (temperature and current weather icon)
- Upcoming rain warning
- Pebble Health steps and activity indicator (outer ring, rotating clockwise, arrow pointing inward shows steps and arrow pointing outward shows activity) with self setting goals (when you pass your goal a new goal is set) or manual goal setting
- Compass

Date, Dual Time, Health and compass can be removed via the option page.

latest_release.release_notes: 2.10 - added a dark background option plus some other UI tweaks

data.title: Round and Smart

data.description: This watchface displays the time in binary using a 12-5-9 format. The first row displays the hour, the second displays the first digit of the minute, and the third displays the right digit of the minute (all in binary). The sides display symbols representing AM or PM (* for AM and | for PM). As binary watchfaces go, this format is fairly quick to read, so you can look nerdy and tell the time simultaneously. Note: This is the first thing I've done on pebble, so if you have any comments, complaints, or suggestions, please let me know!

latest_release.release_notes: Released for Pebble Time

data.description:
Watchface with a 90 degree twist.  
  
Upper left and lower right is the hours.  
Lower left and upper right is the minutes, but twisted 90 degrees anti-clockwise.  
  
Displays in 24 or 12 hour mode, depending on watch settings and there is a configuration option to change the background colors.  
  
Screenshots:
  09:43
  10:18
  22:20 (24 hour)
  22:22 (24 hour)
  08:48 (with Quick View)
  
Design created by László Scheffer, from Hungary, and is published with his permission.  
  
  
Thanks to Paul Rode for help when I was struggling with the size of font needed.

latest_release.release_notes: Added Clay configuration and support for Pebble firmware V4, Pebble 2 and Quick Views.

data.title: 90 Deg

data.author: Good Computer Guy

changelog.release_notes: Updated for Pebble 2.

Bug fixes.
Removed "Loading..." text from weather.

Removed second hand to increase battery life.
Changed weather update to every 15 minutes on the minute (for example: 12:00, 12:15, 12:30, 12:45.) Weather also still updates when the watchface reloads from Timeline or another app.

Added step count. Future release will include a setting to turn that off.
Fixed Weather Underground API key bug generating too many requests errorrs.
Recompiled with latest version.

Added Weather Underground as an option.
Updated configuration page to allow for user WU API key.
Added configuration page to choose F or C. Weather Underground and more configuration options coming soon!
Bug fixes
Updated WU API key

data.description:
Give a Heart if you like... Contact me at the developer contact if you have any issues or comments.

The latest versions adds your current step count at the 3:00 position. Future versions will allow you to turn that off in Settings.

Optional weather from Weather Underground!

A simple analog watchface that gets weather every 15 minutes, on the quarter hour. The default weather source is OpenWeatherMap but if you get a free API key from Weather Underground the weather data will come from there. Simply go to http://www.wunderground.com/weather/api/d/pricing. Please email me if you have any trouble.

The green/red bar shows the battery level. A double-vibration and bluetooth icon indicate a disconnect.

You will need to have Location services enabled on your phone or else the weather will never load because it doesn't know where you are. The temperature is now available in either Fahrenheit or Celsius and can be changed on the Settings page.

Future versions will be more customizable.

Please give a Heart if you like the watch, and email me at the Developer link below with issues, comments and suggestions!

latest_release.release_notes: Updated for Pebble 2.

data.title: Simple Analog Weather

data.description:
Is your watch face  your favorite image?
This watch face is support download image view (to set URL)

Specs
PNG Image Support, Up to about 10KB

How to make image
1. Download your favorite image
2. go to http://www.watchface-generator.de/converter/ and convert
3. converted image publish (your server or direct download cloud service, Dropbox etc)
4. open watchface settings page
5. 3's URL set

Tips
Get Dropbox share link, last "?dl=0" need change "?dl=1".
("?dl=0" is HTML page, "?dl=1" is raw file download)

data.description:
The layout here is very simple - just a number of images randomly updating each minute in the background.

The simple design is taken from my Sentri digital clock - another kickstarter project.

The watchface displays,
battery (when below 40%)
time - 12/24 hr modes
seconds (optional - displays to the right of the time)
temperature, c/f (far left circle) - updates hourly (via yahoo)
weather icon (middle)
humidity percentage (far right circle)
day/date/month 

All images have been individually optimised for the watch.  They all just started out as free HD wallpaper downloads.

When you lose BT connectivity there is an option to vibrate, and the weather disappears.

There are 4 picture themes to choose from - landmarks, Space/Star Wars, Cats 'n dogs, people, and a mixed random mode. 

Image changes can be set to minute or hour refreshes. To force change to a new image it's easiest to just re-apply the settings, or press the menu button to make the screen redraw. A loading image will appear until a theme is selected.

Also, you may notice it takes longer to load this watchface (thus it isn't available for the pebble classic due to the smaller memory size of the watch) - that's because I've used most of the resource limit.  Please make sure your BT connection and /or WiFi remain stable during loading, otherwise it may fail.  If it does, just try again, it'll work!

data.description:
Design and Art Direction by Paul Joel - www.pauljoel.com

Flexible stylish watchface featuring date, battery info and weather. You can select between analog or digital main clock. Secondary info includes current location (city/town), local digital time or time from a different time zone. Color of the sidebar and second hand represent battery health - green, orange, red - or all the colors can be custom configured.

Other configurable options include:

- Step counter from Pebble Health
- Bluetooth disconnect alert in variable vibe strengths
- Separator between hours and minutes - dot or colon
- Temperature format - C or F
- Weather update interval
- Sidebar location (left/right)
- Custom colors 

You will need to get free key for weather services at https://developer.forecast.io - this is one time procedure.

data.description:
A Hebrew hour is defined as 1/12th of the time between sunset and sunrise, or 1/12th of the time between sunrise and sunset. This is a analogue watchface for Pebble smartwatches that shows the positions of the 24 Hebrew hours, along with a hand to sweep over the watchface once every 24 hours. Thus the first orange dot is sunrise, the first blue dot sunset. As the season changes, the inter-dot distance will grow/shrink, to represent the growing/shrinking Hebrew hours of day and night.

Pebble C originally stolen from initialneil/PebbleFace-IvyTick (GitHub), hacked for this purpose, then heavily refactored. PebbleKit JS originally stolen from NOAA Solar Calculator, lightly refactored.

I wrote this for my friend Joe (Happy Hanukkah 5776!), and because I think the idea of Hebrew time is really cool and captures seasonal variation in day length well, helping me value my daytime in winter more.

Public domain as far as I care.

Vaguely tested in CloudPebble emulator, no guarantees this will actually work for you. :3

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed sign error with getTimezoneOffset(). Should now work.

data.title: HebrewTime

data.description:
Inspired disksystem boot screen.

*notice* 

- This watchface is fan-made.
- This watchface is very deplete the battery power, because has been extensive use of animation. So, you may want to use to display during charging.

# このウォッチフェイスについて

ディスクシステムの起動画面をイメージしたウォッチフェイスです。

## 注意

非常に重たいアニメーションの処理を行っているため、電池を過剰に消耗します。おそらく1日も電池が持たないぐらいです。
日々利用するウォッチフェイスではなく、充電中に表示するものとして利用すると良いでしょう。

今後背景のアニメーションをオフにするなど、もう少し日常的に利用しやすい形に手直しをするかもしれません。

contact:
https://twitter.com/polyfusia

latest_release.release_notes: - quick fix random process

data.description:
Relógio de texto em português baseado no watchface PebbleTextWatch opensource de Mihai Dumitrache disponível em https://github.com/wearewip/PebbleTextWatch.

Versão 2 (Dezembro/2015) - Nova e melhorada fonte para os minutos.

latest_release.release_notes: Compatibilidade com firmware 3.8 e correção de erros.

data.title: Relógio Texto Branco

changelog.release_notes: have fun

data.description: A bold watch face with date, battery and fun bluetooth disconnect. Happy holidays give it a heart.

data.description:
A watchface based on the watch packaged with the limited edition of Oyasumi Punpun (おやすみ プンプン) Vol. 13. Oyasumi Punpun is a manga by Asano Inio.

ONLY PEBBLE TIME ROUND SUPPORTED 


This is my first code thing ever so the features are sparse, but hopefully it does the job!

latest_release.release_notes: Beta release, some visual elements need adjustment

data.title: Oyasumi Punpun

data.description:
The female incarnation of Holly from Red Dwarf's alternate universe...now on pebble.

Alright, dudes? Everybody's favourite senile computer with an I.Q. of 6-6000.

Holly/Hilly from Red Dwarf for Aplite, Basalt and Chalk.

latest_release.release_notes: icon fix

data.description:
You don't need to be a bounty hunter to own sport this trophy!  Featuring one of the most famous pilots who make the Kessel Run in 12 Parsecs.

As always, please show developers support by hearting faces you like!

changelog.release_notes: Added showing month/day/day of week when a tap is detected.
Release fixing garbage appear at the right hand side.  Plus the correct display of location of character for 'basalt' and 'chalk'.
Minor Bug fix

data.title: Chinese Calligraphic Watchface

data.author: wedwabbit

changelog.release_notes: Added new font options.
Fixed configuration URL. Sorry about that.
Added ability to chose display font. Two options at the moment. The original Big Time font and the font from Big Again.
Added ability to disable date display.
Another attempt to fix the url issues. This time I used CloudPebble.
- Fixed issue with 12h display.
Fix incorrect url for configuration page.
Initial release.

data.description: A colour version of Big Date+Time. Configuration page allows you to choose font (Original Big Time, Big Again, SquareFace, CST, Alpha Slab, Digital Thin, Digital Thick), separate foreground and background colours for the time and the date, and the amount of time the date stays on the screen.

latest_release.release_notes: Added new font options.

data.title: Big Time+Date Colour
